analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.36. Hetuduka, Ajjhattārammaṇattika🔽Nahetuṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu duka ajjhatta ārammaṇa ttika  na hetum na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā hetu ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
translated: The Reversal of the Order of the Terms of the Law🔽The Section on the Triad of Causes

original: Nahetuṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽(Ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇaṁ natthi.)
analyzed: na hetum na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paccayā hetu bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi 🔽ajjhatta bahiddhā ārammaṇam natthi
translated: With an internal base and not a cause as condition … (as in the first triad of the first chapter) … With ignorance as condition, there is a (volitional) process.
